name: Planet Guardian
description:
Controls: Mouse Or Touch Screen

Game Description: Planet Guardian is very interactive game which can be played by Kids as well as Adults.
It is the First game on Google Play Store related to Corona Virus. Moreover, it is rated 4.9/5 on Google Play Store by happy players.
Planet Guardian is developed for entertainment and bring social awareness in public (under the guidance of Doctors Association) to fight against the Pandemic.
Google Play Store Link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.GradleDoodle.PlanetGuardian&hl=en
